Question: Guangdong Konix Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Konix Technology Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Founded in 2010
- Spans 10,000 square meters with 380 staff
- Over 30 product patents
- Annual output value of $25 million
- High-tech enterprise with ISO9001 and BSCI certifications
- Business channels in 200+ countries
- Focus on educational toys, consumer electronics, roll-up pianos, electric drum kits, wind instruments, MIDI keyboards, and amplifiers
- Emphasis on independent innovation and quality
- Markets in North America, Europe, South America, Oceania, and Southeast Asia
Summary_cn:
广东康尼克斯科技有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 成立于2010年
- 占地面积10,000平方米，拥有380名员工
- 超过30项产品专利
- 年产值达2,500万美元
- 通过ISO9001和BSCI认证的高科技企业
- 在200多个国家拥有业务渠道
- 专注于教育玩具、消费电子、卷起钢琴、电子鼓套装、管乐器、MIDI键盘和音响放大器
- 强调独立创新和品质
- 在北美、欧洲、南美、大洋洲和东南亚市场营销
